resources.string: I am working as an Android Developer in Culture Alley(Hello English).Two more internships in Appzster and CoreApps Lab. The key strengths: 1) Successfully developed 5 live Applications. 2)Worked on Libraries including tesseract-OCR, Epub ,pdf,Facebook and Gmail integration, payment gateway Live Apps in PlayStore:- Hello English App:-https://goo.gl/sZP3p9 Restaurant with home delivery App: https://goo.gl/Udbs1j M-Book reading App: https://goo.gl/PIQ784 Translator App:- https://goo.gl/gO5xNU Agarwal Samaj App:-https://goo.gl/jghZ1M
